1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdur-Rahman bin Abu Bakrah, from his father, that:The Prophet granted a concession to travelers: "If a traveler performed ablution and put on leather socks, then he performed a fresh ablution, he could wipe over the leather socks for three days and nights; the resident could do so for one day and one night

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّوْقِيتِ فِي الْمَسْحِ لِلْمُقِيمِ وَالْمُسَافِرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the period of wiping for residents and travelers
